GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, default order by date created including a total number of comments

GET /api/articles/:articleId.description: serves an object of the requested article by article Id including a total number of comments

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:articleId/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on a specified article, default order by date created

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:articleId/comments.description: Posts a new comment to specified article and serves the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:articleId.description: Updates the votes associated with the article by a value provided

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE/api/comments/:commentId.description: Deletes the selected comment from the database

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
